item.title: Designing a portal that works the way advisors do
item.description: Our research uncovered advisors’ true mental models, shaping a policy-first portal that cut friction and accelerated decision-making.

item.title: Including delisted providers without confusion
item.description: How I used progressive disclosure to navigate adding non-covered providers to our search tool without confusing our members.
